content.query:
SELECT  rate_code_id, rate_code
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'rate_code.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw', 
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
    )WITH(

        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    )   
    AS rate_codes
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH
    (
        rate_code_id SMALLINT,
        rate_code VARCHAR(30)
    );
